授業目的: The purpose of this course is to enable students as future corporate managers to develop management accounting information for management.
到達目標: Students will be able to apply the basic cost/management accounting techniques to day-to-day operations.
授業方法:
The course employs lecture-discussions: class discussions explore insights from assigned readings. Several classes are devoted to exercises. Students are expected to participate actively in class.
The 2021 class will be conducted as a real-time online lesson.
